text: Graham (pronounced as GRAM) is a given name and family name. When used as a given name, it is usually a masculine name. Related names include Grantham or Grant. There are many famous people named Graham. As a family name, Graham was the Anglo-French version of the town Grantham, England. This settlement was recorded in the 11th-century Domesday Book in different forms. They include Grantham, Grandham and Graham. Other versions include Graeme and Grahame. Category:Given names Category:Surnames
title: Graham (name)
